name: Winter Hat Garland
description: I designed these winter hats because I wanted a quicker and easier way to make a perfect, mini pom-pom. I really love how they look on my Christmas tree.
sizes_available: Height with pom-pom: 1.5”/ 4cm, or desired size.
suggested_yarn: Patons North America Classic Wool Worsted
full_text: I designed these winter hats because I wanted a quicker and easier way to make a perfect, mini pom-pom. I really love how they look on my Christmas tree. Praise for Easy Pom Pom Mini Hat Scrap yarn. Fast, and fun. Pattern is perfect! ( Bonewoman ) The pattern is written clearly and easily understandable. (u-wind)
